duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform pre-rinse, wash, and sanitize equipment according to company standards
Inspect other equipment sanitation work and complete checklists daily
Collaborate with sanitation manager and quality control technician to correct cleaning deficiencies
Maintain cleanliness and organization of the work area
Understand and use cleaning chemicals safely and effectively
Set up line and equipment according to company standards before production runs
Establish priorities and work independently without direct supervision
Follow AIB guidelines, HACCP, and GMP
Apply math principles for product usage and dilution rates
Follow safety rules and food safety policies, including the handling of food allergens
Clean and sanitize baking, batching, and ingredient prep equipment
Clean all types of surfaces in designated production areas
Perform tasks that require equipment safety, lockout/tagout, and proper equipment covering
